level.text: "2012 Act" means the Uniform Commercial Code Article 9 Amendments Act of 2012 [D.C. Law 19-302].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-302
level.text: Law 19-302, the "Uniform Commercial Code Article 9 Amendments Act of 2012," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-222. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 2012, and December 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 5, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-669 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-302 became effective on May 1, 2013.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-302: Section 4 of D.C. Law 19-302 provided that the act shall apply as of July 1, 2013.
